fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scan another player to learn their role. (2 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- As the Factional Attacker, you will have Redirection Immunity if you target someone that you previously Scanned.
- Scanning is Astral.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- 1 use Basic Defense
- You may Scan and use the Factional Attack at the same time.
- Redirection Immunity
